snippet.title: Classic Game Room - SHARK ATTACK reviw for Atari 2600
snippet.description:
Shark Attack review. http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Shop CGR shirts & mugs! http://www.CGRstore.com
Classic Game Room reviews SHARK ATTACK for the Atari 2600 VCS Video Game Console. Dodge angry sharks and the Loch-Ness monster in this exciting video game from the 80's.  This retro arcade old school classic features a Pac Man style maze with the terror of Jaws. Great White sharks lunch at you from the corners of the screen while the Lochness Monster (from Scotland) tries to eat you.  With the exciting news of a movie being made about the foudner of Atari, it is fun to play these games from back in the day and revel in their simple yet enjoyable gameplay.  Shark Attack was made by Apollo for the Atari 2600.

Be sure to watch the original Classic Game Room episodes. Classic Game Room was the original classic video game review show on the Internet in 1999-2000, now on DVD. The HD series is reviewing PS3, PS2, Genesis, NES, Atari and Xbox 360. XBLA. videos review reviews show wii
